overview: Newly-promoted secret agents Rachel and George have just successfully (and accidentally) saved the world. As a reward, they take a much-needed romantic cruise. Unfortunately, it is not smooth sailing for long and the comedy quickly ensues as the two bumbling agents find themselves marooned on an uncharted tropical island. Soon they are face to face with a rabid jaguar, hunted by a tribe of sex-starved cannibals.
title: Operation: Tropical Stormy
